creator: david.richmond@zurich.com
text:
My servlets do not load due to a ClassNotFoundError. I have key libraries 
listed in the Java CLASSPATH that appear not to be loaded at all.

There are two work-arounds:

1. If I modify org.apache.catalina.startup.Bootstrap to add all libraries 
listed in System.getProperty("java.class.path") to the ArrayList generated in 
createSharedLoader() then everything works fine.

2. If I put the key libraries into CATALINE-HOME/lib then all works fine.

I would prefer to keep the libraries in the CLASSPATH and not move them around 
or modify Tomcat source code.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
Tomcat 4.0 (as well as 3.3) indeed ignores the system classpath. It was causing 
a lot more problems than it was actually solving.
